text: The Fountain of Bakhchisaray () is a 1909 Russian silent movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Пушкин и кино It stars Vladimir Shaternikov, Maria Korolyova, and E. Uvarova. == Actors == * Vladimir Shaternikov as khan * Maria Korolyova as Zarema * E. Uvarova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov Category:1909 movies
title: The Fountain of Bakhchisaray (movie)
